author: THR staff
title: Late Night Hosts Celebrate Daniel Kaluuya's Awkward Oscars Sex Joke - Hollywood Reporter
description: Trevor Noah, Stephen Colbert and Jimmy Fallon on their shows Monday night homed in on the 'Judas and the Black Messiah' Oscar winner's quip about his parents while his mom was in the audience.
content:
Trevor Noah, Stephen Colbert and Jimmy Fallon had some fun with Daniel Kaluuya's Oscar acceptance speech sex joke on their shows on Monday night.
Accepting the Oscar for best supporting actor for hi… [+2435 chars]
